# core-v1_store_app_summary_list (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `installed` (Boolean) If present, this causes only installed(if true)/uninstalled(if false) applications to be returned.
- `upgradable` (Boolean) If present, this causes only upgradable(if true)/up-to-date(if false) applications to be returned.

### Read-Only

- `store_app_summary_list` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--store_app_summary_list))

<a id="nestedatt--store_app_summary_list"></a>
### Nested Schema for `store_app_summary_list`

Read-Only:

- `app_id` (String) Unique ID identifying this application
- `catalogs` (List of String) Catalogs where this app was found
- `categories` (List of String) Application categories.
- `description` (String) Application description that can be used for user display purposes
- `info_version` (Attributes) The information about an application version available from a catalog.
At least one of "semVer" or "commitHash" must/will be defined. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--info_version))
- `info_version_metadata` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--info_version_metadata))
- `installed` (Boolean) "true" if the app is installed
- `installed_version` (Attributes) The information about an application version available from a catalog.
At least one of "semVer" or "commitHash" must/will be defined. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--installed_version))
- `installed_version_metadata` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--installed_version_metadata))
- `latest_version` (Attributes) The information about an application version available from a catalog.
At least one of "semVer" or "commitHash" must/will be defined. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--latest_version))
- `latest_version_metadata` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--latest_version_metadata))
- `supported_endpoints` (List of String) Application supported endpoints.
- `title` (String) Application title that can be used for user display purposes
- `upgradable` (Boolean) "true" if there is a new version that can be installed

<a id="nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--info_version"></a>
### Nested Schema for `store_app_summary_list.info_version`

Read-Only:

- `app_id` (String) The identifier for the application
- `catalog` (String) The catalog in which this application version was found
- `commit_hash` (String) The commit hash for the application version.
- `sem_ver` (String) The semantic version for the application version.


<a id="nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--info_version_metadata"></a>
### Nested Schema for `store_app_summary_list.info_version_metadata`

Read-Only:

- `published_time` (String) The date and time when the application version was published.


<a id="nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--installed_version"></a>
### Nested Schema for `store_app_summary_list.installed_version`

Read-Only:

- `app_id` (String) The identifier for the application
- `catalog` (String) The catalog in which this application version was found
- `commit_hash` (String) The commit hash for the application version.
- `sem_ver` (String) The semantic version for the application version.


<a id="nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--installed_version_metadata"></a>
### Nested Schema for `store_app_summary_list.installed_version_metadata`

Read-Only:

- `published_time` (String) The date and time when the application version was published.


<a id="nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--latest_version"></a>
### Nested Schema for `store_app_summary_list.latest_version`

Read-Only:

- `app_id` (String) The identifier for the application
- `catalog` (String) The catalog in which this application version was found
- `commit_hash` (String) The commit hash for the application version.
- `sem_ver` (String) The semantic version for the application version.


<a id="nestedatt--store_app_summary_list--latest_version_metadata"></a>
### Nested Schema for `store_app_summary_list.latest_version_metadata`

Read-Only:

- `published_time` (String) The date and time when the application version was published.
